translation.welcome_to_rnstarterkit: Welcome to React Native Starter Kit

errors.no_connection_description: Please check your Wi-Fi connection or cellular data and try again.
errors.server_error_description: Please come back later while we fix this.
errors.oneOf: {{path}} must be one of the following values: {{values}}
errors.uppercase: {{path}} must be a upper case string
errors.min_number: {{path}} must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
errors.max_number: {{path}} must be less than or equal to {{max}}
errors.max_date: {{path}} field must be at earlier than {{max}}
errors.min_array: {{path}} field must have at least {{min}} items
errors.max_array: {{path}} field must have less than or equal to {{max}} items

permissions.location_title: Allow app to access your location
permissions.location_description: By giving us access, it will help us detect your location accurately.
permissions.storage_title: Allow app to access your phone storage?
permissions.storage_description: You will be able to share files from your device to our app.
permissions.camera_title: Allow app to access your camera?
permissions.camera_description: By giving us access, you'll be able to take pictures and share it in the app.
permissions.bluetooth_title: Your Bluetooth seems to be off
permissions.bluetooth_description: Please turn on bluetooth to use this feature.
permissions.deniedDesc: BeRest was denied access to {{permission}} previously. To upload images, please adjust it in your device settings accordingly.
permissions.deviceLocationService: Device location service is not available
permissions.deviceLocationServiceDesc: You have turned off your device location service. You will not be able to use some of the features in the app if it's turned off.

translation.location_not_found_description: Check your keyword or press choose from map to determine the location.

common.accessDeniedDescription: We kindly ask you to try logging in again or reach out to the administrator for assistance with access.
common.offlineDescription: Please check your Wi-Fi connection or cellular data and try again.
common.somethingWrongDescription: Please try to restart the app.

onboarding.body: Login or register to access all features of BeRest

membership.registerDescription: Register your account to start your marketing services
membership.name: Name
membership.errorPasswordNotMatch: Confirm password doesn't match with password!
membership.errorLetterNumber: Must have at least 1 letter and 1 number
membership.verifyDescription: Choose one of the methods to verify your phone number
membership.smsDescription: OTP code will be sent to your phone number
membership.whatsappDescription: OTP code will be sent to your WhatsApp
membership.registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been registered. Please proceed to login.
membership.accountFoundDescription: Your phone number/email has been registered previously. Please proceed to login to continue.
membership.loginDescription: Please enter your credentials to login
membership.accountNotFoundDescription: Try again with the correct account information or register to create a new account.
membership.accountBlocked: Your account has been blocked by the admin
membership.accountBlockedDescription: Contact admin for further information regarding reactivating your account.
membership.deletionProcess: Account is in the process of deletion
membership.deletionProcessDescription: If you log back in during the account deletion process, your account status will return to normal.
membership.resetPasswordDescription: Please enter the registered account phone number to reset the password
membership.resetPasswordSuccessDescription: Please login to your account with the new password.
membership.personalInfoDescription: View details of your personal information
membership.notificationDescription: Get the latest notification from BeRest
membership.transactionHistoryDescription: List of all of your transactions in the BeRest application will be displayed here
membership.changePasswordDescription: Update your password through this menu
membership.deleteAccountDescription: Delete your account through this menu
membership.phoneNumberChangeTitle: Attention! Your phone number has changed
membership.phoneNumberChangeDescription: Please verify the new phone number to continue using our services.
membership.phoneNumberUpdatedDescription: Your phone number has been verified.
membership.whyDeleteAccount: Why do you want to delete your account?
membership.privacyAndSecurityIssue: Privacy and security issues with the application
membership.differentPhoneNumber: Using a different phone number or email
membership.cannotUseForAnotherAccount: The phone number or email above cannot be used for another BeRest account
membership.transactionRelatedData: Some transaction related data may be retained by BeRest in accordance with applicable regulations
membership.automaticallyDeleted: The account will be automatically deleted if you do not log back into the application within the next 7 days
membership.accountSuccessfullyDeletedDescription: Thank you for using BeRest application. See you again another time!
membership.inputOTPCode: Input the OTP code that we sent to
membership.errorOTPCode: The OTP you've entered is incorrect. Please try again.
membership.logoutDescription: Are you sure you want to logout from application?
membership.deleteAccountQDesc: Make sure you check everything that will happen if the account is closed. We can't re-activate your account after 7 days of inactivity.
membership.noTransactionHistory: There is no transaction history yet
membership.noTransactionHistoryDesc: Transaction history will be displayed here.
membership.notificationAlert: Please make sure you have turned on push notification for BeRest on your device settings to receive notifications.
membership.blockedTitle: Your account has been blocked by the admin
membership.blockedDesc: Contact the admin for further information regarding reactivation of the account.
membership.deleteDesc: If you log in again during the account deletion process, your account status will return to normal.
membership.deleteTitle: Account is in the process of being deleted
membership.phoneInvalid: Numbers can only consist of digits
membership.accountDeletedDesc: Try again with another account information to login or register in BeRest app.
membership.accountDeletedDesc2: This number belongs to a deleted account. Try again with another phone number
membership.phoneNumberRegistered: Phone number/email has already been taken
membership.documentsIncompleteDescription: Upload NIB documents so we can verify your business.
membership.phoneNumberRegisteredDesc: The phone number or email you entered is already registered. Please use a different phone number or email.

home.searchNotFoundDescription: We could not find any results matching your search keyword. Please try a different keyword.
home.enableLocationDescription: So that our recommendations can be more accurate for you

ads.noAdsDescription: It seems like you haven't added any ads yet. Let's get started by listing your ads here.
ads.experienceDescription: Please make sure to provide an honest review about this vendor.
ads.thankYouReviewDescription: We appreciate your time and attention in giving feedback on the vendor.
ads.noSearchHistory: You currently have no search history
ads.noSearchHistoryDescription: Your search history and recently viewed ads will appear on this page.
ads.registerAdsDescription: Be part of our service and offer your services to customers on our platform.
ads.paymentSuccessDescription: Register your service now and make sure the data you register is accurate.
ads.reviewEmptyDescription: This company has no reviews for their ads yet. A list of ad reviews from customers will be displayed here.
ads.noReviewByFilter: There are no reviews according to the filter
ads.noReviewByFilterDesc: We couldn't find the review you were looking for by filter. Try using a different filter or resetting the filter.
ads.paymentFailedDesc: Make sure you have carried out the payment process correctly.
ads.noWaitingPayment: There is no list of bills yet
ads.noWaitingPaymentDesc: A list of ads that you haven't paid for will appear here.
ads.noDraftAds: There is no ads quota yet
ads.noDraftAdsDesc: A list of ads that you have purchased will appear here to complete the data.
ads.priceMustBeGreater: Highest price must be greater than lowest price
ads.fillAdsDataDesc: Fill in your service data with correct information
ads.imageValidation: Select JPG or PNG image, max 2MB
ads.successCreateAdDesc: Your ad was created successfully, do a good job and get the best rating!
ads.disableAdDesc: If you disable ads, your ads will not be shown to all app users.
ads.enableAdDesc: If you enable ads then ads will be displayed to all app users.
ads.minimalTyping: Type at least 2 letters to display search suggestions
ads.paymentInformationDesc: Please wait a few moments after the payment is complete.
ads.emptyTitle: There's no ads near Your location right now
ads.emptyDescription: Ads nearby Your current location will shown here.

chat.emptyChat: No messages in your inbox yet!
chat.noConversationDesc: Your conversations with the other user will be displayed here.

help.helpTitle: Find answers to your questions here
help.helpDescription: The Help page can answer your questions regarding the use of our products and services
help.faqDescription: Contain answers to the most commonly asked questions
help.csPhoneDescription: Ask your questions via phone call
help.csChatDescription: Ask your question through our Customer Service

error.passwordCharacter: Password must contain at least 1 letter, 1 number, and 1 special character

translation.wrongFileFormatDescription: The file format must be in .pdf
translation.fileSizeTooBigDescription: The file size must be smaller than 2 MB

order.customerDealTitle: Request the use of services to vendor?
order.customerDealDesc: Make sure you agree with the services offered so that there are no misunderstandings.
order.vendorDealTitle: Have you agreed to start work?
order.vendorDealDesc: Make sure you have discussed it with the customer before starting the work.
order.vendorDoneTitle: Are you sure you have completed the job?
order.vendorDoneDesc: Make sure you have completed the agreed work.
order.customerDoneTitle: Are you sure you want to confirm that the deal is done?
order.customerDoneDesc: Make sure the vendor has completed the work before you end the deal.
order.vendorAccDealDesc: Complete your job so that customers are satisfied.
order.cancelDealDesc: You will lose this opportunity if you cancel the deal. Are you sure you want to cancel?
order.requestService: {{user}} have requested to use the service
order.requestServiceDesc: Waiting for vendor to agree to the deal
order.dealDoneDesc: Waiting for {{user}} to confirm vendor's work
order.dealCompletedDesc: Please leave a review for this order
order.thankYouForYourWork: Thank you for completing the job
order.waitingCustomerToFinish: Waiting for customer to confirm finish deal
order.vendorDealInProgress: The vendor has agreed to the deal
order.vendorDealInProgressDesc: Contact the vendor to start the work immediately.
order.workDealInProgress: You have agreed to the deal
order.workDealInProgressDesc: Start the work as soon as possible to ensure customer satisfaction.

topAds.title: Boost your ad visibility with Top Ads!
topAds.validUntil: Valid until your credit runs out
topAds.setBudget: Set your advertising budget according to your needs
topAds.easierReach: Your ad will be easier for customers to reach
topAds.statistics: View ad statistics to see the number of clicks on your ad
topAds.topAdsCredit: Ads will continue to be Top Ads as long as credit remains
topAds.extend: Extensions can be made at any time
topAds.chooseBudget: Choose a budget for Top Ads
topAds.clickEstimation: Estimated ad clicks that you will get according to budget is
topAds.paymentSuccessDesc: Your ad has been successfully registered as Top Ads. See the progress of your Top Ads in the statistics menu.

translation.backConfirmation: Tap/swipe once more to close the app

versioning.optionalUpdateDesc: Looks like you have an older version of the app. Please update to get latest features & the best experience.
versioning.majorUpdateDesc: Looks like you have an older version of the app. To continue using BeRest, please update the application.
